descriptor: C leaves his apartment leaving M alone
R drops by Ra and M to pick up items for the cat
R take voice messages remotely... +  listen to the message of Ra
Julie rings the doorbell for R to come down
R joins Julie + leaves Ra behind
Pb arrives at J and tells him about his discussion with Scott
Julie w R choose the cat they like, but R hesitates
R comes to continue their conversation
R retraces his steps... and Ra will open the door for him
M is at C's at 6am and he manages to dissuade her to take a nap
